title: Why do first times exist
body: Once in a while you get those people that int just because they are bad but when they write first time and that they don't care because it's solo makes me so triggerd. Can't just riot make a ban on all champions you haven't played in ranked or like you have to have the champion lvl 4 to play it in ranked.

replies.body: Yeah I agree. In heroes of the storm they make you get the hero level to level 5  (about 15 games) before you can play them in ranked

Yeah this makes sense, for a ranked game you should have at least 2 or 3 prior games with that champion, or in order for a champion to get unlocked in ranked, you ought to get a certain rank after a game, like a B+ or higher, for example.

I don't play ranked (only ARAM), but this is a very valid point.
You should not be able to pick champs you have never before played, in ranked.
It's an obvious troll.
Rito plz.
Hahaha fair complaint I must agree.. haha
